modName: Dawnguard Vampire Craftable Clothes Armors and Archmage Robe
summary:
At the forge you can craft all vampire clothes and light armors pieces.
If you have the Archmage\'s Robe on your inventory you can craft all kind of vampire clothes and armors models.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all :)

DESCRIPTION:

This mod allows you to craft all vampire clothes and light armors models at forge.

I added a light armor circlet because there are not nice hoods for light model.

They need no special perks and you can find cloth models on Hide Crafting section and all light armors on Leather section.

This mod does not change original models and the light armors have the same armor rate as original.

To temper all light enchanted armors needs the arcane blacksmith perk.

If you have the Archmage\'s robe on you inventory you can craft all kind of vampire Robes and light cuirasses so you can play a perfect Vampire Archmage! xD


REQUIREMENTS:

1) Skyrim (off course! u.u )

2) Dawnguard

3) Update.esm the last update of the game at 1.9


INSTALLATION:

overwrite Data folder

Turn on \"Vampire Crafting by Cybertron77.esp\" on Mods List.


UNINSTALLATION:

Before uninstall unequip all armors or clothes pieces by your characters and save.

Delete the file \"Vampire Crafting by Cybertron77.esp\" in the Data folder.

HAVE FUN!!!! =D
author: Cybertron77
